title: Students unable to read analog clock after school's smartphone ban
description: A New York school has made a surprising discovery after banning smartphones during school hours. Teachers found their students could not read a traditional clock. #NewYork #smartphones #analogclocks

title: 'Naked Flying' travel trend
description: Young travellers are embracing the 'Naked Flying' trend to avoid airline bag fees by boarding with zero carry-on luggage. The only things you can take are a wallet, phone and charger. #nakedflying #traveltrend #travel #airplanetrend

title: Brigitte Bardot dies aged 91 | 7NEWS
description: French cinema legend and 1960s sex symbol Brigitte Bardot has died aged 91. Known for her iconic role in 'And God Created Woman' and nearly 50 films, she revolutionised French cinema with her distinctive look and bold personality before retiring at 39 to dedicate herself to animal rights advocacy. Her legacy remains complex, marked by her cultural impact on the sexual revolution and later controversial political associations. title: Sydney's New Year's Eve to honour Bondi victims | 7NEWS
description: The New South Wales Premier is urging Sydneysiders to attend New Year's Eve celebrations despite security concerns following the Bondi attack two weeks earlier. More than one million people are expected at Sydney Harbour for the fireworks display, with heavily armed police providing security and a minute's silence planned before 9pm to honour Bondi victims. Waverley Council has cancelled Bondi Beach New Year's Eve celebrations, but the Premier is encouraging residents to support local businesses in the area that have struggled since the attack. title: Masterlock Comanche claims Sydney to Hobart line honours | 7NEWS
description: Masterlock Comanche has won line honours in the 80th Sydney to Hobart yacht race, completing the course in two days, five hours and three minutes. The race saw a dramatic three-way battle between Scallywag, Law Connect and Masterlock Comanche before the latter pulled clear in the Derwent River. Difficult conditions forced 33 boats into retirement during the race. title: Zelensky meets Trump over Ukraine peace plan | 7NEWS
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky is meeting with US President Donald Trump at Mar-a-Lago to discuss a US-brokered 20-point peace plan with revisions and concessions from Ukraine. The talks focus on control of contested territory, security guarantees, and Ukraine's reconstruction funding, following a massive Russian bombardment of Kyiv over the weekend. Any agreement requires Russian approval, though Vladimir Putin is not participating in the discussions and shows no signs of compromise. title: Record rainfall triggers major flood warnings across Queensland | 7NEWS
description: A powerful weather system is causing record rainfall and major flooding across northwest Queensland, with severe weather warnings issued for a vast area of the state. Emergency services are on high alert amid concerns of flooding similar to the devastating 2019 event that killed hundreds of thousands of livestock. Rainfall totals have reached 268 millimetres at South Mission Beach and 177 millimetres inland, with a slow-moving low and trough system expected to bring hundreds more millimetres in coming days.
